EmailTemplate.subject: Invoice [Invoice No.] from Verto Education - Fall 2022 Semester
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for choosing to launch your college career with Verto Education! Below, you'll find an outline of your Verto Experience tuition & fees for the Fall 2022 semester. Please note that balances are due in full by August 1, 2022 or you must request a formal payment plan by July 30, 2022.
Payment Methods:
1) Pay in Full (easiest and most common): Click the yellow “Pay Now” button for a free, fast, and secure ACH bank transfer or Credit Card payment through our partner Blackthorn Payments (powered by Stripe). When you click "Pay Now" below, it will open a new tab in your web browser. Select your desired payment method by toggling between tabs in the payment window. Once payment information is entered, click “Pay”. You will receive a confirmation email from Stripe and Verto Education once your payment processes.
2) Installment Payment Plan: Reach out to billing@vertoeducation.org to discuss your options for a payment arrangement. Payment plans range from 3-5 months depending on when the plan is started.
3) Mail checks to the address below:
Verto Education 3055 NW Yeon Ave #8822 Portland, OR 97210
PAY NOW
Questions? Please email billing@vertoeducation.org and a member of the Billing Team will assist you.
We're looking forward to traveling with you!
Thank you, Verto Education, Inc
3055 NW Yeon Ave, #8822 Portland, OR 97210 © 2022 Verto Education.
